meanings.definition: The state or quality of being gluttonous.
meanings.sent1: Her gluttonousnesses was evident as she devoured the entire cake in one sitting.
meanings.sent2: His gluttonousnesses at the buffet left no food for anyone else.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, his gluttonousnesses knew no bounds when it came to dessert.
meanings.sent4: The gluttonousnesses of the team for victory led them to train harder than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The gluttonousnesses of the monster in the story made it a formidable foe for the hero.

meanings.sent1: The feast was a display of gluttonousnesses, with plates piled high with food.
meanings.sent2: His gluttonousnesses at the party resulted in him feeling sick the next day.
meanings.sent3: The gluttonousnesses of the squirrel as it hoarded nuts for winter was both amusing and impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her gluttonousnesses for knowledge led her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent5: The gluttonousnesses of the storm caused widespread flooding in the area.
